item.description: A step further - and better! - than Basic Obedience! All PIT BULL Basic Obedience!....... This is a formal class beginning Saturday, October 22nd (National Pit Bull Awareness Day!) at 11:00a at Lucky Dogs Day Care in Milford, MA to run 7 weeks (week one: handlers ONLY. Bring your dog to all consecutive classes)............. Topics to include ALL of your basic obedience cues - loose-leash walking, focus, sit, down, wait, stay, drop it, leave it, come - PLUS coursework geared toward these very special breeds, including ways (and TRICKS!) to make you and your bully better breed ambassadors (say that three times fast!)................ Cost is $225, paid up front, and space is limited. Price includes access to private practice workshops............... Open to dogs 16 weeks and up. Whether they have never been in a formal class before or are brushing up on their obedience/distraction work, if you have a pit bull, this is the class for you.............. Call April at (508) 634-3037 to sign up. Email justcassie101@gmail.com with any questions......................... See my listing here: http://www.thumbtack..... Also available for private in-home training and other group classes. Barbara Jean Crehan, our director of public relations, is also an experienced, GIFTED, NEBBC-endorsed dog trainer and can be reached at bjcrehan88@hotmail.com for private in-home consultations/training. Find her on facebook here: http://www.facebook.c.... We are also preparing to welcome our very own Lorena Lacasse, Vice President of the NEBBC to our training staff! She can be reached at newenglandbullybreedclub@gmail.com......................... Hope to see some of you on October 22nd! Happy Training!
item.name: All Pit Bull Basics Class w/Cassie-Leigh Stock, ABCDT at Lucky Dogs Day Care
